jobDescription: You will help innovate and develop reporting and data analytics for the Investment division. You will specifically focus on portfolio analytics covering investment performance, management reporting and external reporting. Responsibilities Create and implement reporting and analytical processes  Develop ways to analyze and build insight into portfolios  Enhance analytics and reporting databases and data tools  Manage project streams with technologists and implement analytics into systems  Own and manage the data integrity as needed Qualifications Bachelors degree or equivalent experience, preferably in engineering and/or computer science  Minimum of 2-3 years of work experience in a relevant field within the financial services, and data brokerage industries  Advanced proficiency in Python, SQL, VBA and Linux/Unix experience, statistics and data analysis  Proficiency in Excel/Data Visualization, Tableau experience a plus  Experience with handling large datasets across multiple database systems  Excellent analytical and quantitative skills with strong attention to detail  Strong written and oral communication skills  Apply
